glsa.title: Exiv2: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Exiv2 could lead to Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Exiv2 is a C++ library and a command line utility to manage image metadata.

description.p: Exiv2 has a buffer overflow in the RiffVideo::infoTagsHandler function in riffvideo.cpp.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition via a specially crafted AVI file with IKEY INFO tag.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Exiv2 users should upgrade to the latest version:
